title: Precision Jet Spray Care for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
description: This is an instructional video to care for your precision jet spray on your iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot. To clean the nozzle in the front of the robot, wipe it down with a clean, damp cloth.

asset.title: Precision Jet Spray Care for iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot
asset.description:
This is an instructional video to care for your precision jet spray on your iRobot® Braava jet™ Mopping Robot. To clean the nozzle in the front of the robot, wipe it down with a clean, damp cloth.

For more information, please visit http://bit.ly/1RLeEJh.
asset.author: iRobot

transcripts: The Braava jet mopping robot uses a precision jet spray to loosen dirt while wet mopping or damp sweeping. The spray nozzle in front of the robot should always be kept clean and clear. Simply wipe it down with a clean damp cloth.
